**Setup Instructions:**\n\n1. Copy the *:
**Setup Instructions:**

1. Copy the **Webhook URL** below.
2. Go to your [Kapso dashboard](https://app.kapso.ai) and open your WhatsApp number settings.
3. Paste the URL as your **Webhook destination URL**.
4. Incoming WhatsApp events will now trigger this flow.

**Webhook URL:**
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```

**Setup Instructions:**

1. Copy the **Webhook URL** below.
2. Go to your [Kapso dashboard](https://app.kapso.ai) and open your WhatsApp number settings.
3. Paste the URL as your **Webhook destination URL**.
4. Message status updates will now trigger this flow.

**Webhook URL:**
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
Only trigger for a specific status. Leav: Only trigger for a specific status. Leave as All to trigger for any status change.
